import Component from './component.mdx';


<If condition={props.isVisible}>
  <Component firstName={props.name} />
</If>
<ElseIf condition={props.isEqualTo2(props.num)}>
  # Condition2
</ElseIf>
<Else>
  <If condition={props.num == 2}>
    # Nested Condition 1
  </If>
  <Else>
  # Nested Default
  </Else>
  # Default
</Else>
